questions.text: Has there ever been a period when you felt so good or hyper that other people thought you were not your normal self?
You were so irritable that you shouted at people or started fights?
You felt much more self-confident than usual?
You got much less sleep than usual and didn’t really miss it?
You were more talkative or spoke faster than usual?
Thoughts raced through your head or you couldn’t slow your mind down?
You were so easily distracted by things around you?
You had much more energy than usual?
You were much more active or did many more things than usual?
You were much more social or outgoing than usual?
If you checked YES to more than one, did these happen during the same period of time?
How much of a problem did these cause (work, family, social, legal)?
